title: Hash One Gaming - LF Coach/Analyst to join our team

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hello there,

If you're a constant browser of the Recruitment forum, you've probably seen posts regarding our teams. However now, we're in need of coaching staff to help out with the large growth & extra pressure that has come with the oceanic open ladder.

For now, we're looking to find two people who are looking for a future career in coaching and analysis in the oceanic e sports scene.

As an applicant for this position, you would:
1. Have an increased understanding of League of Legends gameplay, mechanics and tactics
2. Be experienced in 5v5 scenarios, team comps & the current meta.
3. Have experience in coaching or analysis 

As a perfect applicant, you would:
1. Be over the age of 18
2. Have experience playing in Diamond+ tier
3. Reside in Melbourne, Australia.


If you think you'd be a good fit for an up and coming e-sports organisation, feel free to email tom@hash1gaming.com
Keep in mind, the more effort you put into an application the better! If you've got a resume, send it through :).
